name: Allspace
detailed_description:
Shred space ships with lasers, plasma, and missiles in an epic online multiplayer space battle with Allspace. Up to 100 players can blast each other online.

Features:

  • First Person Space Pilot
  • Online Multiplayer with support for up to 100 players
  • Highly Optimized (150+ FPS on a modern gaming PC)

Online Multiplayer

Allspace supports up to 100 players at a time.

Gameplay

Allspace currently supports Deathmatch mode. Additional game modes, including team modes, will be added during Early Access. Join the Steam Discussion forums for Allspace to suggest new games modes and features.

Supports Keyboard, Mouse, Game Controller, and Joysticks

All keyboard, mouse, game controller, and joystick controls can be re-mapped to suit each player's unique play style.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10 (64-bit OS required)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-8100 @ 3.60GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 equivalent or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible soundcard or onboard chipset
